Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a plant that is healthy and growing when it has enough water.
The student can illustrate a plant that is not healthy and not growing when it does not have enough water.
The student can show a difference between a plant with water and a plant without water using clear patterns in their drawing.
The student can use their drawing to explain that plants need water to live and grow.
